Class Histogram

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.convenience.Histogram
public class Histogram
extends java.lang.Object
Histogram of an image with 8 bits red, 8 bits green, and 8 bits blue.

    • reportGrey

      public void reportGrey()

    • getLevels

      public double[] getLevels​(int numLevels) throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
      Split a histogram into numLevels regions of equal weight. the total weight is the sum of all the histogram values.
      Parameters:
      numLevels - must be >0
      Returns:
      an array filled with the cutoff point between each of the weighted zones.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException

    • getLevelsMapped

      public double[] getLevelsMapped​(double[] input) throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
      Split a histogram into regions. The total weight is the sum of all the histogram values. The
      Parameters:
      input - an array of values [0...1] indicating the cutoff desired for each zone.
      Returns:
      a new array of values with the equivalent histogram value for each cutoff.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException
